blocks.name: nnm0

blocks.name: nnmsuc
blocks.content: Multiplication with successor. Theorem 4J(A2) of [Enderton] p. 80. (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: nnesuc
blocks.content: Exponentiation with a successor exponent. Definition 8.30 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 67. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: nna0r
blocks.content: Addition to zero. Remark in proof of Theorem 4K(2) of [Enderton] p. 81. Note: In this and later theorems, we deliberately avoid the more general ordinal versions of these theorems (in this case ~ oa0r ) so that we can avoid ~ ax-rep , which is not needed for finite recursive definitions. (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2014.)

thm nna0r(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, com), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, c0), c0))
} = {
  finds(hs0, hs1, c0, wceq(co(emptycls, coa, c0), c0), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, emptycls), emptycls), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  eqeq12d(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, emptycls), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, emptycls, coa)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  eqeq12d(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), emptycls, coa)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  eqeq12d(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), emptycls, coa)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  eqeq12d(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, emptycls, coa)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, emptycls), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, con0))
  0elon()
  oa0(emptycls)
  syl5ibcom(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)))), wcel(emptycls, com))
  peano1()
  nnasuc(emptycls, cv(hs1))
  eqeq2d(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1))), csuc(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))
  suceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, c0), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, emptycls), emptycls))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
}

thm nna0r(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ _om →(∅[+o]c0)= c0)
} = {
  finds(hs0, hs1, c0, (∅[+o]c0)= c0, (∅[+o]hs0)= hs0, (∅[+o]∅)= ∅, (∅[+o]hs1)= hs1, (∅[+o]suc(hs1))= suc(hs1))
  eqeq12d((∅[+o]hs0), hs0, (∅[+o]∅), emptycls, hs0 = ∅)
  oveq2(hs0, emptycls, emptycls, coa)
  id(hs0 = ∅)
  eqeq12d((∅[+o]hs0), hs0, (∅[+o]hs1), hs1, hs0 = hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, hs1, emptycls, coa)
  id(hs0 = hs1)
  eqeq12d((∅[+o]hs0), hs0, (∅[+o]suc(hs1)), suc(hs1), hs0 = suc(hs1))
  oveq2(hs0, suc(hs1), emptycls, coa)
  id(hs0 = suc(hs1))
  eqeq12d((∅[+o]hs0), hs0, (∅[+o]c0), c0, hs0 = c0)
  oveq2(hs0, c0, emptycls, coa)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  ax-mp((∅[+o]∅)= ∅, ∅ ∈ On)
  0elon()
  oa0(emptycls)
  syl5ibcom(hs1 ∈ _om, (∅[+o]hs1)= hs1, (∅[+o]suc(hs1))= suc(hs1), (∅[+o]suc(hs1))= suc((∅[+o]hs1)))
  mpan(hs1 ∈ _om, (∅[+o]suc(hs1))= suc((∅[+o]hs1)), ∅ ∈ _om)
  peano1()
  nnasuc(emptycls, hs1)
  eqeq2d((∅[+o]suc(hs1)), suc((∅[+o]hs1)), suc(hs1), (∅[+o]hs1)= hs1)
  suceq((∅[+o]hs1), hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((∅[+o]c0)= c0)
  diff.hs0.w((∅[+o]∅)= ∅)
  diff.hs0.w((∅[+o]hs1)= hs1)
  diff.hs0.w((∅[+o]suc(hs1))= suc(hs1))
  diff.hs1.w((∅[+o]hs0)= hs0)
}

thm nnm0r(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, com), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, c0), emptycls))
} = {
  finds(hs0, hs1, c0, wceq(co(emptycls, comu, c0), emptycls), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs0)), emptycls), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, emptycls), emptycls), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), emptycls), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), emptycls))
  eqeq1d(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs0)), emptycls, co(emptycls, comu, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, emptycls, comu)
  eqeq1d(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs0)), emptycls, co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), emptycls, comu)
  eqeq1d(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs0)), emptycls, co(emptycls, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), emptycls, comu)
  eqeq1d(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs0)), emptycls, co(emptycls, comu, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, emptycls, comu)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(emptycls, comu, emptycls), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, con0))
  om0(emptycls)
  syl5ibr(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), emptycls), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), emptycls), wceq(co(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, emptycls), emptycls))
  syl6eq(co(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, emptycls), emptycls, co(emptycls, coa, emptycls), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), emptycls))
  oveq1(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), emptycls, coa, emptycls)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, emptycls), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, con0))
  0elon()
  oa0(emptycls)
  eqeq1d(co(emptycls, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), emptycls, co(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs1), com))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, emptycls)), wcel(emptycls, com))
  peano1()
  nnmsuc(emptycls, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, comu, c0), emptycls))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, comu, emptycls), emptycls))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs1)), emptycls))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), emptycls))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(co(emptycls, comu, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
}

} = {

blocks.name: nnacl
blocks.content: Closure of addition of natural numbers. Proposition 8.9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 59. (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnacl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com))
  vtoclga(hs0, c1, com, wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com)), wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com))
  eleq1d(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, coa, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, coa)
  finds2(hs0, hs1, wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com), wcel(co(c0, coa, emptycls), com), wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), com))
  eleq1d(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, coa, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0, coa)
  eleq1d(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, coa)
  eleq1d(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c0, coa)
  ibir(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coa, emptycls), com))
  eleq1d(co(c0, coa, emptycls), com, c0, wcel(c0, com))
  nna0(c0)
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), com)))
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)), wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), com), wcel(csuc(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1))), com))
  peano2(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)))
  eleq1d(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), com, csuc(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)))
  nnasuc(c0, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, com))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, coa, emptycls), com))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), com))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), com))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, com))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com))
}

thm nnacl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om)→(c0[+o]c1)∈ _om)
} = {
  impcom(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (c0[+o]c1)∈ _om)
  vtoclga(hs0, c1, com, (c0 ∈ _om →(c0[+o]c1)∈ _om), (c0 ∈ _om →(c0[+o]hs0)∈ _om))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c1, c0 ∈ _om, (c0[+o]hs0)∈ _om, (c0[+o]c1)∈ _om)
  eleq1d((c0[+o]hs0), com, (c0[+o]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, coa)
  finds2(hs0, hs1, c0 ∈ _om, (c0[+o]hs0)∈ _om, (c0[+o]∅)∈ _om, (c0[+o]hs1)∈ _om, (c0[+o]suc(hs1))∈ _om)
  eleq1d((c0[+o]hs0), com, (c0[+o]∅), hs0 = ∅)
  oveq2(hs0, emptycls, c0, coa)
  eleq1d((c0[+o]hs0), com, (c0[+o]hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, hs1, c0, coa)
  eleq1d((c0[+o]hs0), com, (c0[+o]suc(hs1)), hs0 = suc(hs1))
  oveq2(hs0, suc(hs1), c0, coa)
  ibir(c0 ∈ _om, (c0[+o]∅)∈ _om)
  eleq1d((c0[+o]∅), com, c0, c0 ∈ _om)
  nna0(c0)
  expcom(hs1 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ _om, ((c0[+o]hs1)∈ _om →(c0[+o]suc(hs1))∈ _om))
  syl5ibr((c0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om), (c0[+o]hs1)∈ _om, (c0[+o]suc(hs1))∈ _om, suc((c0[+o]hs1))∈ _om)
  peano2((c0[+o]hs1))
  eleq1d((c0[+o]suc(hs1)), com, suc((c0[+o]hs1)), (c0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om))
  nnasuc(c0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ _om →(c0[+o]c1)∈ _om))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[+o]∅)∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[+o]hs1)∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[+o]suc(hs1))∈ _om)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ _om)
  diff.hs1.w((c0[+o]hs0)∈ _om)
}

blocks.name: nnmcl
blocks.content: Closure of multiplication of natural numbers. Proposition 8.17 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 63. (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnmcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), com))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), com))
  vtoclga(hs0, c1, com, wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), com)), wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), com))
  eleq1d(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, comu, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, comu)
  finds2(hs0, hs1, wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com), wcel(co(c0, comu, emptycls), com), wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(c0, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), com))
  eleq1d(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, comu, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0, comu)
  eleq1d(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, comu)
  eleq1d(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c0, comu)
  syl6eqel(co(c0, comu, emptycls), com, emptycls, wcel(c0, com))
  nnm0(c0)
  peano1()
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(c0, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), com)))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)), wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(c0, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), com), wcel(co(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, c0), com))
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wi(wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, c0), com)))
  expcom(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, c0), com))
  nnacl(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), c0)
  eleq1d(co(c0, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), com, co(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, c0), wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)))
  nnmsuc(c0, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), com)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, com))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, comu, emptycls), com))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs1)), com))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), com))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, com))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com))
}

thm nnmcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om)→(c0[×o]c1)∈ _om)
} = {
  impcom(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (c0[×o]c1)∈ _om)
  vtoclga(hs0, c1, com, (c0 ∈ _om →(c0[×o]c1)∈ _om), (c0 ∈ _om →(c0[×o]hs0)∈ _om))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c1, c0 ∈ _om, (c0[×o]hs0)∈ _om, (c0[×o]c1)∈ _om)
  eleq1d((c0[×o]hs0), com, (c0[×o]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, comu)
  finds2(hs0, hs1, c0 ∈ _om, (c0[×o]hs0)∈ _om, (c0[×o]∅)∈ _om, (c0[×o]hs1)∈ _om, (c0[×o]suc(hs1))∈ _om)
  eleq1d((c0[×o]hs0), com, (c0[×o]∅), hs0 = ∅)
  oveq2(hs0, emptycls, c0, comu)
  eleq1d((c0[×o]hs0), com, (c0[×o]hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, hs1, c0, comu)
  eleq1d((c0[×o]hs0), com, (c0[×o]suc(hs1)), hs0 = suc(hs1))
  oveq2(hs0, suc(hs1), c0, comu)
  syl6eqel((c0[×o]∅), com, emptycls, c0 ∈ _om)
  nnm0(c0)
  peano1()
  expcom(hs1 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ _om, ((c0[×o]hs1)∈ _om →(c0[×o]suc(hs1))∈ _om))
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om), (c0[×o]hs1)∈ _om, (c0[×o]suc(hs1))∈ _om, ((c0[×o]hs1)[+o]c0)∈ _om)
  adantr(c0 ∈ _om, hs1 ∈ _om, ((c0[×o]hs1)∈ _om →((c0[×o]hs1)[+o]c0)∈ _om))
  expcom(c0 ∈ _om, (c0[×o]hs1)∈ _om, ((c0[×o]hs1)[+o]c0)∈ _om)
  nnacl((c0[×o]hs1), c0)
  eleq1d((c0[×o]suc(hs1)), com, ((c0[×o]hs1)[+o]c0), (c0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om))
  nnmsuc(c0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ _om →(c0[×o]c1)∈ _om))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[×o]∅)∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[×o]hs1)∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[×o]suc(hs1))∈ _om)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ _om)
  diff.hs1.w((c0[×o]hs0)∈ _om)
}

blocks.name: nnecl
blocks.content: Closure of exponentiation of natural numbers. Proposition 8.17 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 63. (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnecl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), com))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), com))
  vtoclga(hs0, c1, com, wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), com)), wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), com)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), com), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), com))
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, coe, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, coe)
  finds2(hs0, hs1, wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), com), wcel(co(c0, coe, emptycls), com), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), com))
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, coe, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0, coe)
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, coe)
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), com, co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c0, coe)
  syl6eqel(co(c0, coe, emptycls), com, c1o, wcel(c0, com))
  syl(wcel(c0, com), wceq(co(c0, coe, emptycls), c1o), wcel(c0, con0))
  nnon(c0)
  oe0(c0)
  eqeltri(c1o, com, csuc(emptycls))
  df-1o()
  ax-mp(wcel(csuc(emptycls), com), wcel(emptycls, com))
  peano1()
  peano2(emptycls)
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), com)))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), com), wcel(co(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), comu, c0), com))
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wi(wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), comu, c0), com)))
  expcom(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), com), wcel(co(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), comu, c0), com))
  nnmcl(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), c0)
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), com, co(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), comu, c0), wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)))
  nnesuc(c0, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), com)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, com))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, coe, emptycls), com))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), com))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), com))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, com))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), com))
}

thm nnecl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om)→(c0[^o]c1)∈ _om)
} = {
  impcom(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (c0[^o]c1)∈ _om)
  vtoclga(hs0, c1, com, (c0 ∈ _om →(c0[^o]c1)∈ _om), (c0 ∈ _om →(c0[^o]hs0)∈ _om))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c1, c0 ∈ _om, (c0[^o]hs0)∈ _om, (c0[^o]c1)∈ _om)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]hs0), com, (c0[^o]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, coe)
  finds2(hs0, hs1, c0 ∈ _om, (c0[^o]hs0)∈ _om, (c0[^o]∅)∈ _om, (c0[^o]hs1)∈ _om, (c0[^o]suc(hs1))∈ _om)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]hs0), com, (c0[^o]∅), hs0 = ∅)
  oveq2(hs0, emptycls, c0, coe)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]hs0), com, (c0[^o]hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, hs1, c0, coe)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]hs0), com, (c0[^o]suc(hs1)), hs0 = suc(hs1))
  oveq2(hs0, suc(hs1), c0, coe)
  syl6eqel((c0[^o]∅), com, c1o, c0 ∈ _om)
  syl(c0 ∈ _om, (c0[^o]∅)= 1o, c0 ∈ On)
  nnon(c0)
  oe0(c0)
  eqeltri(c1o, com, suc(∅))
  df-1o()
  ax-mp(suc(∅)∈ _om, ∅ ∈ _om)
  peano1()
  peano2(emptycls)
  expcom(hs1 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ _om, ((c0[^o]hs1)∈ _om →(c0[^o]suc(hs1))∈ _om))
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om), (c0[^o]hs1)∈ _om, (c0[^o]suc(hs1))∈ _om, ((c0[^o]hs1)[×o]c0)∈ _om)
  adantr(c0 ∈ _om, hs1 ∈ _om, ((c0[^o]hs1)∈ _om →((c0[^o]hs1)[×o]c0)∈ _om))
  expcom(c0 ∈ _om, (c0[^o]hs1)∈ _om, ((c0[^o]hs1)[×o]c0)∈ _om)
  nnmcl((c0[^o]hs1), c0)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]suc(hs1)), com, ((c0[^o]hs1)[×o]c0), (c0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om))
  nnesuc(c0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ _om →(c0[^o]c1)∈ _om))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[^o]∅)∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[^o]hs1)∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[^o]suc(hs1))∈ _om)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ _om)
  diff.hs1.w((c0[^o]hs0)∈ _om)
}

blocks.name: nnacli
blocks.content: ` _om ` is closed under addition. Inference form of ~ nnacl . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 20-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: nnmcli
blocks.content: ` _om ` is closed under multiplication. Inference form of ~ nnmcl . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 20-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: nnarcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure law for addition of natural numbers. Exercise 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 62 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 12-Dec-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnarcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wb(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com))))
} = {
  impbid1(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)))
  jcad(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wcel(c0, com)), wss(c0, co(c0, coa, c1)))
  oaword1(c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wss(c0, co(c0, coa, c1)), wi(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wcel(c0, com))))
  expd(wcel(c0, con0), wss(c0, co(c0, coa, c1)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wcel(c0, com))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wa(wss(c0, co(c0, coa, c1)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com)), wcel(c0, com)), word(c0), word(com))
  eloni(c0)
  ordtr2(c0, com, co(c0, coa, c1))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(c1, co(c0, coa, c1)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wss(c1, co(c0, coa, c1)))
  oaword2(c1, c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wss(c1, co(c0, coa, c1)), wi(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wcel(c1, com))))
  expd(wcel(c1, con0), wss(c1, co(c0, coa, c1)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com), wcel(c1, com))
  sylancl(wcel(c1, con0), wi(wa(wss(c1, co(c0, coa, c1)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), com)), wcel(c1, com)), word(c1), word(com))
  eloni(c1)
  ordom()
  ordtr2(c1, com, co(c0, coa, c1))
  nnacl(c0, c1)
}

thm nnarcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On)→((c0[+o]c1)∈ _om ↔(c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om)))
} = {
  impbid1((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), (c0[+o]c1)∈ _om, (c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om))
  jcad((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), (c0[+o]c1)∈ _om, c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om)
  mpd((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), ((c0[+o]c1)∈ _om → c0 ∈ _om), c0 ⊆(c0[+o]c1))
  oaword1(c0, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, (c0 ⊆(c0[+o]c1)→((c0[+o]c1)∈ _om → c0 ∈ _om)))
  expd(c0 ∈ On, c0 ⊆(c0[+o]c1), (c0[+o]c1)∈ _om, c0 ∈ _om)
  sylancl(c0 ∈ On, ((c0 ⊆(c0[+o]c1)∧(c0[+o]c1)∈ _om)→ c0 ∈ _om), Ord(c0), Ord(_om))
  eloni(c0)
  ordtr2(c0, com, (c0[+o]c1))
  mpd((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), ((c0[+o]c1)∈ _om → c1 ∈ _om), c1 ⊆(c0[+o]c1))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, c1 ⊆(c0[+o]c1))
  oaword2(c1, c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, (c1 ⊆(c0[+o]c1)→((c0[+o]c1)∈ _om → c1 ∈ _om)))
  expd(c1 ∈ On, c1 ⊆(c0[+o]c1), (c0[+o]c1)∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om)
  sylancl(c1 ∈ On, ((c1 ⊆(c0[+o]c1)∧(c0[+o]c1)∈ _om)→ c1 ∈ _om), Ord(c1), Ord(_om))
  eloni(c1)
  ordom()
  ordtr2(c1, com, (c0[+o]c1))
  nnacl(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: nnacom
blocks.content: Addition of natural numbers is commutative. Theorem 4K(2) of [Enderton] p. 81. (Contributed by NM, 6-May-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnacom(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c1, coa, c0)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c1, coa, c0)))
  vtoclga(hs0, c0, com, wi(wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c1, coa, c0))), wi(wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(cv(hs0), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(cv(hs0), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c1, coa, c0)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c0, coa, c1), co(c1, coa, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, coa, c1)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1, coa)
  finds2(hs0, hs1, wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(cv(hs0), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, c1), co(c1, coa, emptycls)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0)), co(emptycls, coa, c1), co(c1, coa, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), emptycls, coa, c1)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c1, coa)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), coa, c1)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, coa)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0)), co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c1, coa)
  eqtr4d(co(emptycls, coa, c1), co(c1, coa, emptycls), c1, wcel(c1, com))
  nna0r(c1)
  nna0(c1)
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wceq(csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1)), csuc(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1)))))
  suceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1)))
  eqeq12d(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1)), csuc(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)))
  imp(wcel(c1, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1))))
  vtoclga(hs0, c1, com, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, cv(hs0)), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, cv(hs0)), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0)))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1))))
  eqeq12d(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, cv(hs0)), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0))), co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, c1), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, csuc(cv(hs1)), coa)
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0))), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, c1))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), coa, c1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), coa)
  suceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), coa, c1))
  finds2(hs0, hs2, wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, cv(hs0)), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0)))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, emptycls), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, emptycls))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, cv(hs2)), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, csuc(cv(hs2))), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, csuc(cv(hs2))))))
  eqeq12d(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, cv(hs0)), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0))), co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, emptycls), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, csuc(cv(hs1)), coa)
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0))), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, emptycls))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), coa, emptycls)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1), coa)
  suceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), coa, emptycls))
  eqeq12d(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, cv(hs0)), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0))), co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, cv(hs2)), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), csuc(cv(hs1)), coa)
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0))), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs2))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cv(hs1), coa)
  suceq(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs2)))
  eqeq12d(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, cv(hs0)), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, cv(hs0))), co(csuc(cv(hs1)), coa, csuc(cv(hs2))), csuc(co(cv(hs1), coa, csuc(cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs2))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs2)), csuc(cv(hs1)), coa)

blocks.name: nnaordi
blocks.content: Ordering property of addition. Proposition 8.4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 58, limited to natural numbers. (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: nnmass
blocks.content: Multiplication of natural numbers is associative. Theorem 4K(4) of [Enderton] p. 81. (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)

thm nnmass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

blocks.content: Multiplication with successor. Exercise 16 of [Enderton] p. 82. (Contributed by NM, 21-Sep-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: nnmcom
blocks.content: Multiplication of natural numbers is commutative. Theorem 4K(5) of [Enderton] p. 81. (Contributed by NM, 21-Sep-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)

thm nnmcom(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c1, comu, c0)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c1, comu, c0)))
  vtoclga(hs0, c0, com, wi(wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c1, comu, c0))), wi(wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(cv(hs0), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs0)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(cv(hs0), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c1, comu, c0)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs0)), co(c0, comu, c1), co(c1, comu, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, comu, c1)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1, comu)
  finds2(hs0, hs1, wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(cv(hs0), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, c1), co(c1, comu, emptycls)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs0)), co(emptycls, comu, c1), co(c1, comu, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), emptycls, comu, c1)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c1, comu)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), comu, c1)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, comu)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs0)), co(csuc(cv(hs1)), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), comu, c1)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c1, comu)
  eqtr4d(co(emptycls, comu, c1), co(c1, comu, emptycls), emptycls, wcel(c1, com))
  nnm0r(c1)
  nnm0(c1)
  ex(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs1), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c1, com)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs1), comu, c1), coa, c1), co(co(c1, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, c1)))
  oveq1(co(cv(hs1), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, c1)
  eqeq12d(co(csuc(cv(hs1)), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(co(cv(hs1), comu, c1), coa, c1), co(co(c1, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c1, com)))
  nnmsucr(cv(hs1), c1)
  ancoms(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(c1, comu, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(co(c1, comu, cv(hs1)), coa, c1)))
  nnmsuc(c1, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(cv(hs1), comu, c1), co(c1, comu, cv(hs1))))

  oveq1(hs0, emptycls, comu, c1)

  syl5ibr((hs1 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), (hs1[×o]c1)=(c1[×o]hs1), (suc(hs1)[×o]c1)=(c1[×o]suc(hs1)), ((hs1[×o]c1)[+o]c1)=((c1[×o]hs1)[+o]c1))
  oveq1((hs1[×o]c1), (c1[×o]hs1), coa, c1)
  eqeq12d((suc(hs1)[×o]c1), (c1[×o]suc(hs1)), ((hs1[×o]c1)[+o]c1), ((c1[×o]hs1)[+o]c1), (hs1 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om))
  nnmsucr(hs1, c1)
  ancoms(hs1 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (c1[×o]suc(hs1))=((c1[×o]hs1)[+o]c1))
  nnmsuc(c1, hs1)

blocks.name: nnaword
blocks.content: Weak ordering property of addition. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnaword(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, coa, c0), co(c2, coa, c1))))
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, coa, c0), co(c2, coa, c1)), wn(wcel(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(co(c2, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c0))))
  notbid(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(co(c2, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c0)))

  orim12d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c0), wceq(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), co(c2, comu, c0)))
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))))
  oveq2(c0, c1, c2, comu)
  3adantl2(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(emptycls, c2), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), co(c2, comu, c0))))
  nnmordi(c0, c2, c1)
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wb(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wn(wo(wceq(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), co(c2, comu, c0))))), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), com), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), com))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(c0, com))
  nnmcl(c2, c0)
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(c1, com))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  nnmcl(c2, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), com), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), com), wb(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wn(wo(wceq(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), co(c2, comu, c0))))), word(co(c2, comu, c0)), word(co(c2, comu, c1)))
  nnord(co(c2, comu, c0))
  nnord(co(c2, comu, c1))
  ordtri2(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wo(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c0)))), wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(emptycls, c2))

  nnord(c0)
  nnord(c1)
  ordtri2(c0, c1)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wi(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2)))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2), wne(c2, emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wi(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  syl5(wcel(c1, com), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wne(c2, emptycls), wne(co(c2, comu, c1), emptycls))
  ne0i(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))

blocks.name: nnmword
blocks.content: Weak ordering property of ordinal multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnmword(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wn(wcel(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), co(c2, comu, c0))))
  notbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), co(c2, comu, c0)))
  sylan9bbr(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), co(c2, comu, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(emptycls, c2)))
  iba(wcel(emptycls, c2), wcel(c1, c0))
  3com12(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wb(wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), co(c2, comu, c0))))
  nnmord(c1, c0, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wb(wss(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c1, c0))), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c0, com))
  nnon(c0)
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c1, com))
  nnon(c1)
  ontri1(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wb(wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wn(wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), co(c2, comu, c0)))), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), con0), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), con0))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), con0), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), com))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(c0, com))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  nnmcl(c2, c0)
  nnon(co(c2, comu, c0))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), con0), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), com))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c1), com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(c1, com))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  nnmcl(c2, c1)
  nnon(co(c2, comu, c1))
  ontri1(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))
}

blocks.name: nnmcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for multiplication of natural numbers. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnmcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wa(wss(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wss(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1))), wa(wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1)))
  bicomd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wa(wss(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wss(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1))), wa(wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1)))
  anbi12d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1), wss(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wss(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1)))
  sylanb(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wb(wss(c1, c2), wss(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2))), w3a(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wcel(c0, com)))
  3anrot(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com))
  nnmword(c1, c2, c0)
  sylanb(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wb(wss(c2, c1), wss(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1))), w3a(wcel(c2, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, com)))
  3anrev(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com))
  nnmword(c2, c1, c0)
  eqss(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2))
  eqss(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: nnmwordi
blocks.content: Weak ordering property of multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnmwordi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))))
} = {
  pm2.61d(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2), wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))))
  biimpd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)))
  nnmword(c0, c1, c2)
  a1dd(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wn(wcel(emptycls, c2)), wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)))
  sylbird(w3a(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com)), wn(wcel(emptycls, c2)), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wb(wceq(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, c2))))
  syl(wcel(c2, com), wb(wceq(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, c2))), word(c2))
  nnord(c2)
  necon2bbid(c2, emptycls, word(c2), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  ord0eln0(c2)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c2, com), wi(wceq(c2, emptycls), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wceq(c2, emptycls), wss(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wss(co(emptycls, comu, c0), co(emptycls, comu, c1)))
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(co(emptycls, comu, c0), co(emptycls, comu, c1)), wss(emptycls, emptycls))
  ssid(emptycls)
  sseq12d(co(emptycls, comu, c0), co(emptycls, comu, c1), emptycls, emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, c0), emptycls))
  nnm0r(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, c1), emptycls))
  nnm0r(c1)
  sseq12d(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1), co(emptycls, comu, c0), co(emptycls, comu, c1), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  oveq1(c2, emptycls, comu, c0)
  oveq1(c2, emptycls, comu, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnmwordi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om ∧ c2 ∈ _om)→(c0 ⊆ c1 →(c2[×o]c0)⊆(c2[×o]c1)))
} = {
  pm2.61d((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om ∧ c2 ∈ _om), (c0 ⊆ c1 →(c2[×o]c0)⊆(c2[×o]c1)), ∅ ∈ c2)
  ex((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om ∧ c2 ∈ _om), ∅ ∈ c2, (c0 ⊆ c1 →(c2[×o]c0)⊆(c2[×o]c1)))
  biimpd(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om ∧ c2 ∈ _om)∧ ∅ ∈ c2), c0 ⊆ c1, (c2[×o]c0)⊆(c2[×o]c1))
  nnmword(c0, c1, c2)
  a1dd((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om ∧ c2 ∈ _om), ¬ ∅ ∈ c2, c0 ⊆ c1, (c2[×o]c0)⊆(c2[×o]c1))
  sylbird((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om ∧ c2 ∈ _om), ¬ ∅ ∈ c2, (c2[×o]c0)⊆(c2[×o]c1), c2 = ∅)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, c2 ∈ _om, (c2 = ∅ ↔ ¬ ∅ ∈ c2))
  syl(c2 ∈ _om, (c2 = ∅ ↔ ¬ ∅ ∈ c2), Ord(c2))
  nnord(c2)
  necon2bbid(c2, emptycls, Ord(c2), ∅ ∈ c2)
  ord0eln0(c2)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, c2 ∈ _om, (c2 = ∅ →(c2[×o]c0)⊆(c2[×o]c1)))
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c2 = ∅, (c2[×o]c0)⊆(c2[×o]c1), (∅[×o]c0)⊆(∅[×o]c1))
  mpbiri((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), (∅[×o]c0)⊆(∅[×o]c1), ∅ ⊆ ∅)
  ssid(emptycls)
  sseq12d((∅[×o]c0), (∅[×o]c1), emptycls, emptycls, (c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om))
  adantr(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (∅[×o]c0)= ∅)
  nnm0r(c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (∅[×o]c1)= ∅)
  nnm0r(c1)
  sseq12d((c2[×o]c0), (c2[×o]c1), (∅[×o]c0), (∅[×o]c1), c2 = ∅)
  oveq1(c2, emptycls, comu, c0)
  oveq1(c2, emptycls, comu, c1)
}

blocks.name: nnmwordri
blocks.content: Weak ordering property of ordinal multiplication. Proposition 8.21 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 63, limited to natural numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: nnawordex
blocks.content: Equivalence for weak ordering of natural numbers. (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2002.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnawordex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wb(wss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, com, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, com, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, com, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, com, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), com), wceq(co(c0, coa, cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))))), c1))
  eqssd(co(c0, coa, cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))))), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(c0, c1)))
  mpjaod(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(c0, c1)), wss(co(c0, coa, cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))))), c1), wceq(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), emptycls), wrex(s0, com, wceq(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), csuc(cv(s0)))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(c0, c1)), wceq(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), emptycls), wss(co(c0, coa, cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))))), c1), wss(co(c0, coa, emptycls), c1))
  eqsstrd(co(c0, coa, emptycls), c1, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(c0, c1)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wss(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, coa, emptycls), c0))
  nna0(c0)
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wss(c0, c1))
  sseq1d(co(c0, coa, cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))))), c1, co(c0, coa, emptycls), wceq(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), emptycls))
  oveq2(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wss(c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), emptycls, c0, coa)

thm nnaordex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))))
  mpdd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))), wrex(s0, com, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))
  sylibd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, com, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)), wss(c0, c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, con0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c1, con0))
  nnon(c1)
  onelss(c1, c0)
  nnawordex(s0, c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wrex(s0, com, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)), wrex(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))))))
  ex(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c0, c1), wi(wrex(s0, com, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)), wrex(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))))
  reximdva(s0, com, wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1), wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))
  ancrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), com)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)))

  syl5ibrcom(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), com)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(c0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  simplr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), com))

  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wrex(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))), wcel(c0, c1)))
  rexlimdva(s0, com, wcel(c0, com), wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c0, c1))
  expimpd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(s0), com)), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(s0), com)), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))))
  biimpa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(s0), com)), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wcel(c0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(s0), com)), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wcel(c0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))), wcel(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c0, coa, cv(s0))))

thm nnaordex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om)→(c0 ∈ c1 ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ _om,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧(c0[+o]s0)= c1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ _om,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧(c0[+o]s0)= c1)))
  mpdd((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ _om,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧(c0[+o]s0)= c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ _om,(c0[+o]s0)= c1))
  sylibd((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ _om,(c0[+o]s0)= c1), c0 ⊆ c1)
  syl((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ⊆ c1), c1 ∈ On)
  adantl(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ On)
  nnon(c1)
  onelss(c1, c0)
  nnawordex(s0, c0, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (c0 ∈ c1 →(∃(s0 ∈ _om,(c0[+o]s0)= c1)→ ∃(s0 ∈ _om,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧(c0[+o]s0)= c1)))))
  ex(c0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ c1, (∃(s0 ∈ _om,(c0[+o]s0)= c1)→ ∃(s0 ∈ _om,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧(c0[+o]s0)= c1))))
  reximdva(s0, com, (c0 ∈ _om ∧ c0 ∈ c1), (c0[+o]s0)= c1, (∅ ∈ s0 ∧(c0[+o]s0)= c1))
  ancrd(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ s0 ∈ _om), (c0[+o]s0)= c1, ∅ ∈ s0)
  sylibrd(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ s0 ∈ _om), (c0[+o]s0)= c1, ∅ ∈ s0, c0 ∈(c0[+o]s0))
  syl5ibrcom(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ s0 ∈ _om), (c0[+o]s0)= c1, c0 ∈(c0[+o]s0), c0 ∈ c1)

  adantlr(c0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ _om, (∅ ∈ s0 ↔ c0 ∈(c0[+o]s0)))
  adantr(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (∃(s0 ∈ _om,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧(c0[+o]s0)= c1))→ c0 ∈ c1))
  rexlimdva(s0, com, c0 ∈ _om, (∅ ∈ s0 ∧(c0[+o]s0)= c1), c0 ∈ c1)
  expimpd((c0 ∈ _om ∧ s0 ∈ _om), ∅ ∈ s0, (c0[+o]s0)= c1, c0 ∈ c1)
  syl5ibcom(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ s0 ∈ _om)∧ ∅ ∈ s0), (c0[+o]s0)= c1, c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈(c0[+o]s0))
  biimpa((c0 ∈ _om ∧ s0 ∈ _om), ∅ ∈ s0, c0 ∈(c0[+o]s0))
  bitrd((c0 ∈ _om ∧ s0 ∈ _om), ∅ ∈ s0, c0 ∈(c0[+o]s0), (c0[+o]∅)∈(c0[+o]s0))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ _om, s0 ∈ _om, (∅ ∈ s0 ↔(c0[+o]∅)∈(c0[+o]s0)))
  mp3an1(s0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ _om, (∅ ∈ s0 ↔(c0[+o]∅)∈(c0[+o]s0)), ∅ ∈ _om)
  peano1()
  nnaord(emptycls, s0, c0)
  eleq1d((c0[+o]∅), (c0[+o]s0), c0, (c0 ∈ _om ∧ s0 ∈ _om))

blocks.name: oaabslem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ oaabs . (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm oaabslem(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com)), wceq(co(c0, coa, com), com))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c0, coa, com), com, wa(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com)))
  ancoms(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com), wss(co(c0, coa, com), com))
  eqsstrd(co(c0, coa, com), com, ciun(hs0, com, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(com, con0)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, com), wcel(com, con0), wceq(co(c0, coa, com), ciun(hs0, com, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, con0), wa(wcel(com, con0), wlim(com)))
  jctr(wcel(com, con0), wlim(com))
  limom()
  oalim(hs0, c0, com, con0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(com, con0), wss(ciun(hs0, com, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))), com))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, com), wss(ciun(hs0, com, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))), com), wral(hs0, com, wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, com, wcel(c0, com), wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs0), com)), wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com), word(com), wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com))
  ordom()
  nnacl(c0, cv(hs0))
  ordelss(com, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))
  iunss(hs0, com, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), com)
  sylan2(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com), wss(com, co(c0, coa, com)), wcel(c0, con0))
  nnon(c0)
  oaword2(com, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, com))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oaabslem(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((_om ∈ On ∧ c0 ∈ _om)→(c0[+o]_om)= _om)
} = {
  eqssd((c0[+o]_om), com, (_om ∈ On ∧ c0 ∈ _om))
  ancoms(_om ∈ On, c0 ∈ _om, (c0[+o]_om)⊆ _om)
  eqsstrd((c0[+o]_om), com, ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[+o]hs0)), (c0 ∈ _om ∧ _om ∈ On))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ _om, _om ∈ On, (c0[+o]_om)= ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[+o]hs0)), c0 ∈ On, (_om ∈ On ∧ Lim(_om)))
  jctr(_om ∈ On, Lim(_om))
  limom()
  oalim(hs0, c0, com, con0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ _om, _om ∈ On, ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[+o]hs0))⊆ _om)
  sylibr(c0 ∈ _om, ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[+o]hs0))⊆ _om, ∀(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[+o]hs0)⊆ _om))
  ralrimiva(hs0, com, c0 ∈ _om, (c0[+o]hs0)⊆ _om)
  sylancr((c0 ∈ _om ∧ hs0 ∈ _om), (c0[+o]hs0)⊆ _om, Ord(_om), (c0[+o]hs0)∈ _om)
  ordom()
  nnacl(c0, hs0)
  ordelss(com, (c0[+o]hs0))
  iunss(hs0, com, (c0[+o]hs0), com)
  sylan2(_om ∈ On, c0 ∈ _om, _om ⊆(c0[+o]_om), c0 ∈ On)
  nnon(c0)
  oaword2(com, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ _om)
}

blocks.name: oaabs
blocks.content: Ordinal addition absorbs a natural number added to the left of a transfinite number. Proposition 8.10 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 59. (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oaabs(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c1))
} = {
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c1), wrex(hs0, con0, wceq(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wrex(hs0, con0, wceq(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1)), wreu(hs0, con0, wceq(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1)))
  sylancom(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1), wreu(hs0, con0, wceq(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1)), wa(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wcel(com, con0), wcel(c1, con0))
  simplr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0), wss(com, c1))
  oawordeu(hs0, com, c1)
  reurex(hs0, con0, wceq(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1))
  rexlimdva(hs0, con0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wceq(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c1))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wceq(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c1), wceq(co(c0, coa, co(com, coa, cv(hs0))), co(com, coa, cv(hs0))))
  eqtr3d(co(c0, coa, co(com, coa, cv(hs0))), co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, coa, com), coa, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wceq(co(co(c0, coa, com), coa, cv(hs0)), co(c0, coa, co(com, coa, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(com, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  ad3antrrr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0), wss(com, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(c0, con0))
  nnon(c0)
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(com, con0))
  simpr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  oaass(c0, com, cv(hs0))
  oveq1d(co(c0, coa, com), coa, cv(hs0), com, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wceq(co(c0, coa, com), com))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)), wceq(co(c0, coa, com), com), wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com))
  adantll(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0), wss(com, c1), wcel(com, con0))
  imp(wcel(c1, con0), wss(com, c1), wcel(com, con0))
  syl6com(wcel(c1, con0), wss(com, c1), wcel(com, con0), wcel(com, universe))
  ex(wss(com, c1), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(com, universe))
  ssexg(com, c1, con0)
  omelon2()
  simpll(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0), wss(com, c1))
  oaabslem(c0)
  eqeq12d(co(c0, coa, co(com, coa, cv(hs0))), co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c0, coa, c1), c1, wceq(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1))
  oveq2(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1, c0, coa)
  id(wceq(co(com, coa, cv(hs0)), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(com, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oaabs(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1)→(c0[+o]c1)= c1)
} = {
  mpd(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1), (c0[+o]c1)= c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ On,(_om[+o]hs0)= c1))
  syl(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ On,(_om[+o]hs0)= c1), ∃!(hs0 ∈ On,(_om[+o]hs0)= c1))
  sylancom((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On), _om ⊆ c1, ∃!(hs0 ∈ On,(_om[+o]hs0)= c1), (_om ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On))
  jca(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1), _om ∈ On, c1 ∈ On)
  simplr(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ On, _om ⊆ c1)
  oawordeu(hs0, com, c1)
  reurex(hs0, con0, (_om[+o]hs0)= c1)
  rexlimdva(hs0, con0, ((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1), (_om[+o]hs0)= c1, (c0[+o]c1)= c1)
  syl5ibcom((((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ On), (_om[+o]hs0)= c1, (c0[+o]c1)= c1, (c0[+o](_om[+o]hs0))=(_om[+o]hs0))
  eqtr3d((c0[+o](_om[+o]hs0)), (_om[+o]hs0), ((c0[+o]_om)[+o]hs0), (((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ On))
  syl3anc((((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ On), ((c0[+o]_om)[+o]hs0)=(c0[+o](_om[+o]hs0)), c0 ∈ On, _om ∈ On, hs0 ∈ On)
  ad3antrrr(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ On, _om ⊆ c1, hs0 ∈ On, c0 ∈ On)
  nnon(c0)
  adantr(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1), hs0 ∈ On, _om ∈ On)
  simpr(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1), hs0 ∈ On)
  oaass(c0, com, hs0)
  oveq1d((c0[+o]_om), coa, hs0, com, (((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ On))
  adantr(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1), hs0 ∈ On, (c0[+o]_om)= _om)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1), (c0[+o]_om)= _om, _om ∈ On, c0 ∈ _om)
  adantll(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ On, _om ⊆ c1, _om ∈ On)
  imp(c1 ∈ On, _om ⊆ c1, _om ∈ On)
  syl6com(c1 ∈ On, _om ⊆ c1, _om ∈ On, _om ∈ 𝕌)
  ex(_om ⊆ c1, c1 ∈ On, _om ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexg(com, c1, con0)
  omelon2()
  simpll(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ On, _om ⊆ c1)
  oaabslem(c0)
  eqeq12d((c0[+o](_om[+o]hs0)), (_om[+o]hs0), (c0[+o]c1), c1, (_om[+o]hs0)= c1)
  oveq2((_om[+o]hs0), c1, c0, coa)
  id((_om[+o]hs0)= c1)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ c1))
  diff.hs0.w((c0[+o]c1)= c1)
}

blocks.name: oaabs2
blocks.content: The absorption law ~ oaabs is also a property of higher powers of ` _om ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oaabs2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, coa, c2), c2))
} = {
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, coa, c2), c2), wrex(hs0, con0, wceq(co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wrex(hs0, con0, wceq(co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0)), c2)), wreu(hs0, con0, wceq(co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  syl21anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wreu(hs0, con0, wceq(co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(co(com, coe, c1), con0), wcel(c2, con0), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2))
  simplr(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2))
  oawordeu(hs0, co(com, coe, c1), c2)
  reurex(hs0, con0, wceq(co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0)), c2))
  rexlimdva(hs0, con0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0)), c2), wceq(co(c0, coa, c2), c2))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wceq(co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0)), c2), wceq(co(c0, coa, c2), c2), wceq(co(c0, coa, co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0))), co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0))))
  eqtr3d(co(c0, coa, co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0))), co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), coa, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wceq(co(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), coa, cv(hs0)), co(c0, coa, co(co(com, coe, c1), coa, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(co(com, coe, c1), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(c0, con0))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(co(com, coe, c1), con0))
  simpr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  oaass(c0, co(com, coe, c1), cv(hs0))
  oveq1d(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), coa, cv(hs0), co(com, coe, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wceq(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), co(com, coe, c1)))
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), co(com, coe, c1)), w3o(wceq(c1, emptycls), wrex(hs0, con0, wceq(c1, csuc(cv(hs0)))), wlim(c1)))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), w3o(wceq(c1, emptycls), wrex(hs0, con0, wceq(c1, csuc(cv(hs0)))), wlim(c1)), word(c1))
  ordzsl(hs0, c1)
  3jaod(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls), wrex(hs0, con0, wceq(c1, csuc(cv(hs0)))), wlim(c1), wceq(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), co(com, coe, c1)))
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), co(com, coe, c1)))
  eqtrd(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), co(com, coe, c1), co(emptycls, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  oveq1d(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1), emptycls, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  sylib(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, c1o))
  eleqtrd(c0, c1o, co(com, coe, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  simplll(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  sylan9eqr(co(com, coe, c1), c1o, co(com, coe, emptycls), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  oveq2(c1, emptycls, com, coe)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(co(com, coe, emptycls), c1o), wcel(com, con0))
  oe0(com)
  el1o(c0)
  syl(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(co(com, coe, c1), con0))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls), wcel(co(com, coe, c1), con0))
  oa0r(co(com, coe, c1))
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, con0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wceq(c1, csuc(cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), co(com, coe, c1)))
  eqssd(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), co(com, coe, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wceq(c1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))
  rexlimddv(hs1, com, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wceq(c1, csuc(cv(hs0))))), wss(co(c0, coa, co(com, coe, c1)), co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c0, co(co(com, coe, cv(hs0)), comu, cv(hs1))))
  syl21anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(com, coe, c1)), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(co(com, coe, c1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wceq(c1, csuc(cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, com, wcel(c0, co(co(com, coe, cv(hs0)), comu, cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(com, coe, cv(hs0)), con0), wa(wcel(com, con0), wlim(com)), wcel(c0, co(co(com, coe, cv(hs0)), comu, com)))

thm omabslem(class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wceq(co(c0, comu, com), com))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c0, comu, com), com, w3a(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com), wcel(emptycls, c0)))
  3adant3(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com), wcel(emptycls, c0), wss(co(c0, comu, com), com))
  ancoms(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com), wss(co(c0, comu, com), com))
  eqsstrd(co(c0, comu, com), com, ciun(hs0, com, co(c0, comu, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(com, con0)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, com), wcel(com, con0), wceq(co(c0, comu, com), ciun(hs0, com, co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, con0), wa(wcel(com, con0), wlim(com)))
  jctr(wcel(com, con0), wlim(com))
  limom()
  omlim(hs0, c0, com, con0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(com, con0), wss(ciun(hs0, com, co(c0, comu, cv(hs0))), com))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, com), wss(ciun(hs0, com, co(c0, comu, cv(hs0))), com), wral(hs0, com, wss(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, com, wcel(c0, com), wss(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs0), com)), wss(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com), word(com), wcel(co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com))
  ordom()
  nnmcl(c0, cv(hs0))
  ordelss(com, co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)))
  iunss(hs0, com, co(c0, comu, cv(hs0)), com)
  syl3an2(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, com), wcel(emptycls, c0), wss(com, co(c0, comu, com)), wcel(c0, con0))
  nnon(c0)
  3impa(wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0), wss(com, co(c0, comu, com)))
  omword2(com, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, com))
}

thm omabslem(class c0) {

} = {

  eqsstrd((c0[×o]_om), com, ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[×o]hs0)), (c0 ∈ _om ∧ _om ∈ On))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ _om, _om ∈ On, (c0[×o]_om)= ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[×o]hs0)), c0 ∈ On, (_om ∈ On ∧ Lim(_om)))
  jctr(_om ∈ On, Lim(_om))
  limom()
  omlim(hs0, c0, com, con0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ _om, _om ∈ On, ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[×o]hs0))⊆ _om)
  sylibr(c0 ∈ _om, ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[×o]hs0))⊆ _om, ∀(hs0 ∈ _om,(c0[×o]hs0)⊆ _om))
  ralrimiva(hs0, com, c0 ∈ _om, (c0[×o]hs0)⊆ _om)
  sylancr((c0 ∈ _om ∧ hs0 ∈ _om), (c0[×o]hs0)⊆ _om, Ord(_om), (c0[×o]hs0)∈ _om)
  ordom()
  nnmcl(c0, hs0)
  ordelss(com, (c0[×o]hs0))
  iunss(hs0, com, (c0[×o]hs0), com)
  syl3an2(_om ∈ On, c0 ∈ _om, ∅ ∈ c0, _om ⊆(c0[×o]_om), c0 ∈ On)

  3impa(_om ∈ On, c0 ∈ On, ∅ ∈ c0, _om ⊆(c0[×o]_om))
  omword2(com, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ _om)

blocks.name: nneob
blocks.content: A natural number is even iff its successor is odd. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: omopthi
blocks.content: An ordered pair theorem for ` _om ` . Theorem 17.3 of [Quine] p. 124. This proof is adapted from ~ nn0opthi . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

thm omopthi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wcel(c2, com)

} = {
  impbii(wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))

  eqtr4d(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c3), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3)))
  oveq2d(c2, coa, c1, c3, wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3)))

  nnacom(c1, c2)

  nnacan(c1, c0, c2)
  sylib(wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c3)))
  eqtr4d(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c3), co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3)))
  id(wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3)))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c3, co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3)))

  onordi(co(c0, coa, c1))
  nnoni(co(c0, coa, c1))
  onordi(co(c2, coa, c3))
  nnoni(co(c2, coa, c3))
  ordtri3(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c3))

  sylnib(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c3)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3)), wceq(co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3), co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1)))
  omopthlem2(c0, c1, co(c2, coa, c3), c3)
  nnacli(c2, c3)
  eqcom(co(co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), coa, c3), co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1))
  omopthlem2(c2, c3, co(c0, coa, c1), c1)
  mp3an(wb(wceq(co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1), co(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c3)), wceq(c1, c3)), wcel(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), com), wcel(c1, com), wcel(c3, com))
  nnmcli(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c1))
  nnacli(c0, c1)
  nnacan(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), c1, c3)
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1)), coa, c1, co(co(c2, coa, c3), comu, co(c2, coa, c3)), c3, wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  oveq12d(co(c0, coa, c1), comu, co(c0, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c3), co(c2, coa, c3), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
